title: Larsa Pippen, 45, opts for racy look as she arrives at Hollywood nightclub in her $200K Lamborghini
text:
She filed for divorce from husband of 21-years, Scottie Pippen, just under one year ago.

And Larsa Pippen was showing her ex what he was missing on Friday night, when she was spotted at Hyde nightclub in West Hollywood.

The 45-year-old put on quite the leggy display while rolling up in her red Lamborghini, priced upwards of $200,000.

She's here! Larsa Pippen stunned in a racy ensemble for a nightclub outing on Friday night at Hyde in West Hollywood. The 45-year-old got all heads turning when she arrived in her Lamborghini

Larsa opted for a black velvet long-sleeved jumpsuit that barely kept her modest.

She teamed the look with a pair of over-the-knee boots that elongated her 5ft2 frame with its small block heel.

The beauty with a net worth of $14 million, flashed her large jeweled accessorized and carried with her a tiny black bag.

Larsa styled her long blonde tresses out into loose waves for the late night club appearance.

Her glam was kept youthful and dewy with blushed cheeks and a bold red color on her eyelids.

The mom-of-four appeared in high spirits as she played with the camera in front of her expensive Lamborghini.

Makeup: Her glam was kept youthful and dewy with blushed cheeks and a bold red color on her eyelids

Larsa filed for divorce from former NBA champion, Scottie, 54, in November 2018 citing 'irreconcilable differences' as the reason for their split.

'It is with deep sadness that Scottie and I announce that we are legally separating. We both tried very hard for a long time to make our marriage work and have ultimately come to the conclusion that it is best that we live separate lives,' Larsa said in a statement at the time.

'We have so many amazing memories together, remain best of friends and love each other very much. Our four children have always been our priority and for their sake we ask for as much privacy as possible for our family during this sensitive time.'

Flying solo: Larsa filed for divorce from former NBA champion, Scottie, 54, in November 2018 citing 'irreconcilable differences' as the reason for their split

The duo, who married in 1997, share four children together; sons Scotty Pippen Jr., 18, Preston, 17, Justin, 14, and daughter Sophia, 10.

They separated for the first time in October 2016, during which time Larsa was rumored to be dating rapper Future, although both denied it at the time.

Larsa and Scottie reconciled in February 2017 with a source at the time saying they intended to work on their relationship.
